Title: Forcing My Hand
Description:
I do not know if Ardgrin merely intended to sabotage me or if he wanted to force a confrontation. Either way, a confrontation he will have.

I believe this situation can be rectified peacefully, but I cannot do it as the Councilward. Steelvein has never appeared in the stone, but he must now. I will parlay with Ardgrin in the Deeps and this situation will be concluded.

I would have you accompany me, but there are some things I want you to know before that. Help me prepare and I will speak with you.
ObjectivesText: Help Merrix disguise himself as Steelvein.
RewardText:
I will have this solved peacefully.

Though if Ardgrin asks for violence, we will answer.
